title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file, the export fails.
EB: If you name the file foo.txt in project 1 and also name a file foo.txt in project 2, the export fails.
SR:
1. Create two projects.
2. In project 1, create a file named foo.txt.
3. In project 2, create a file named foo.txt.
4. Attempt to export both projects to a zip file.
